source.description: Data for various NIST tests (abbreviated, unabbreviated syntax)
Data for various NIST tests (abbreviated, unabbreviated syntax)

test-case.name: fn-transform-1
test-case.description: Loads a stylesheet from the location render.xsl, applies it to a document loaded from works-mod.xml, and uses an XPath expression to examine the result
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri)})return $result?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-1a
test-case.description: Loads a stylesheet from the location render.xsl, applies it to a document loaded from works-mod.xml. Delivery format set to xs:string
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "serialized"})return $result?output instance of xs:string

test-case.name: fn-transform-1b
test-case.description: Loads a stylesheet from the location render.xsl, applies it to a document loaded from works-mod.xml. Delivery format set to document node (the default)
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "document"})return $result?output instance of node()

test-case.name: fn-transform-1c
test-case.description: Same as fn-transform-1 with XP30 syntax
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri)})return $result("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-1d
test-case.description: Same as fn-transform-1a with XP30 syntax
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "serialized"})return $result("output") instance of xs:string

test-case.name: fn-transform-1e
test-case.description: Same as fn-transform-1b with XP30 syntax
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "document"})return $result("output") instance of node()

test-case.name: fn-transform-2
test-case.description: This test case demonstrates the ability to retrieve multiple result documents. Transform depends on XSLT 3.0 processor

modified.change: Fix options xslt-version and initial-template, typos in stylesheet, return statement and assertion

test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0' xmlns:app='http://www.example.com'> <xsl:template name='app:main' > <xsl:for-each select='//section'> <xsl:result-document href='section{position()}.html'> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" , $xml := "<doc> <section>sect1</section> <section>sect2</section> </doc>" return element{xs:QName('html')}{ element {xs:QName('body')} { for $x in fn:transform(map{"xslt-version":2.0, "stylesheet-text":$xsl, "base-output-uri":"http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/output-doc.xml", "initial-template":fn:QName('http://www.example.com','main'), "source-node":fn:parse-xml($xml)})?* return $x } }

test-case.name: fn-transform-3
test-case.description: Use of stylesheet-params option

modified.change: Fix variable $in, use of fn:QName(), and result assertions; and change test-case description
Added XP31+ dependency, there is no XQ31 specific syntax

test-case.name: fn-transform-3a
test-case.description: Same as fn-transform-3 with XP30 syntax

test-case.name: fn-transform-4
test-case.description: Outputs the result as html, use of serialization-params

modified.change: Fix stylesheet, use of fn:QName(), and result assertion
Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup
Bug 29440/29443: serialization params aligned with fn:serialize()

test-case.test:
let $in := xs:string(" XSLT Programmer?s Reference Michael H. Kay XSLT Doug Tidwell Simon St. Laurent Robert Romano "), $style := xs:string('
:
') return transform(map{"source-node":fn:parse-xml($in), "stylesheet-text":$style, "serialization-params": map{"indent": true()} } )("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-5
test-case.description: Outputs the result as html; input source and stylesheet as strings

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup

test-case.test:
let $in := xs:string(" XSLT Programmer?s Reference Michael H. Kay XSLT Doug Tidwell Simon St. Laurent Robert Romano "), $style := xs:string('
:
') return transform(map{"source-node":fn:parse-xml($in), "stylesheet-text":$style } )("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-6
test-case.description: Transform with minimal options: stylesheet-text, source-node
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>") })

test-case.name: fn-transform-7
test-case.description: Transform with minimal options: stylesheet-node, source-node
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-node":parse-xml($xsl), "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>") })

test-case.name: fn-transform-8
test-case.description: Transform with minimal options: stylesheet-node, source-node

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup

test-case.test: transform(map{"stylesheet-node":fn:parse-xml("<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>"), "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>") })

test-case.name: fn-transform-9
test-case.description: Transform using option initial-template
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main') })

test-case.name: fn-transform-10
test-case.description: Transform using option initial-template
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0' xmlns:app='http://www.example.com'> <xsl:template match='/'> <x><xsl:value-of select='.' /></x> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name='app:main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('http://www.example.com','main') })

test-case.name: fn-transform-11
test-case.description: Transform using option initial-template, without source-node
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0' xmlns:app='http://www.example.com'> <xsl:template match='/'> <x><xsl:value-of select='.' /></x> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name='app:main'> <out>that</out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('http://www.example.com','main') })

test-case.name: fn-transform-12
test-case.description: Transform using option initial-mode
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <x><xsl:value-of select='.' /></x> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match='/' mode='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-mode": fn:QName('','main') })

test-case.name: fn-transform-13
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <xsl:for-each select='//section'> <xsl:result-document href='section{position()}.html'> <!-- instructions content here --> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" , $xml := "<doc> <section>sect1</section> <section>sect2</section> <section>sect3</section> </doc>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xml), "base-output-uri":"http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/output-doc.xml"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-13a
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents (with content)
test-case.test:
let $xsl :=" Section <xsl:value-of select='position()'/>

Header for section

The content of .

Next section

First section

 " , $xml := "
sect1
sect2
sect3
" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xml), "base-output-uri":"http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/output-doc.xml"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-14
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, with base-output-uri option
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs, "source-node":$sections, "base-output-uri": "http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/output-doc.xml"}) => map:keys()

test-case.name: fn-transform-15
test-case.description: Transform using option stylesheet-params with multiple params

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup

test-case.test: let $in := parse-xml("<dummy/>")/*, $style := parse-xml("<xsl:stylesheet version='1.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'> <xsl:param name='v'/> <xsl:param name='w'/> <xsl:param name='x'/> <xsl:param name='y'/> <xsl:template match='dummy'> <out> <v><xsl:value-of select='$v'/></v> <w><xsl:value-of select='$w'/></w> <x><xsl:value-of select='$x'/></x> <y><xsl:value-of select='$y'/></y> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>") return (transform(map{"source-node":$in, "stylesheet-node":$style, "stylesheet-params": map { QName("","v"): "2", QName("","w"): "3", QName("","y"): "5", QName("","x"): "4" } } ) )("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-16
test-case.description: Transform using option base-output-uri
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "document", "base-output-uri" : $base-uri})($base-uri)

test-case.name: fn-transform-17
test-case.description: Transform using option base-output-uri
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "document", "base-output-uri" : $base-uri})

test-case.name: fn-transform-18
test-case.description: Transform using options stylesheet-text and stylesheet-base-uri
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet version='2.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'> <xsl:template name='main'> <x><xsl:value-of select='static-base-uri()'/></x> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text" : $xsl, "initial-template" : QName('','main'), "stylesheet-base-uri": "http://www.example.com"})?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-19
test-case.description: Transform using options stylesheet-node and stylesheet-base-uri
test-case.test: declare base-uri "http://www.example.com/base"; let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet version='2.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'> <xsl:template name='main'> <x><xsl:value-of select='static-base-uri()'/></x> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node" : parse-xml($xsl), "initial-template" : QName('','main'), "stylesheet-base-uri": "http://www.example.com"})?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-20
test-case.description: Transform using options stylesheet-location and stylesheet-base-uri

test-case.name: fn-transform-21
test-case.description: Transform using static base URI default from option stylesheet-location
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : "http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/staticbaseuri.xsl", "initial-template" : QName('','main')})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-22
test-case.description: Transform using xsl:include with relative href, using options stylesheet-text and stylesheet-base-uri
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet version='2.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'> <xsl:include href='transform/staticbaseuri.xsl'/> </xsl:stylesheet>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text" : $xsl, "initial-template" : QName('','main'), "stylesheet-base-uri": string(static-base-uri())})?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-23
test-case.description: Transform using xsl:include with relative href, using options stylesheet-node and stylesheet-base-uri
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node" : $include, "source-node" : $works, "stylesheet-base-uri": string(base-uri($include))})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-24
test-case.description: Transform using xsl:include with relative href, with static base URI default from option stylesheet-node
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node" : $include, "source-node" : $works})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-25
test-case.description: Transform using stylesheet-location (with a relative URI)
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : "transform/render.xsl", "source-node" : $works})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-26
test-case.description: Transform using cache option true

modified.change: result now indicates whether caching took place
Now runs in XPath as suggested by bug 29997

test-case.name: fn-transform-27
test-case.description: Transform using cache option false

modified.change: Now runs in XPath as suggested by bug 29997

test-case.name: fn-transform-28
test-case.description: Transform using serialized delivery-format option, and serialization-params (no indent)
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params" : map { "indent": false() } })

test-case.name: fn-transform-29
test-case.description: Transform using serialized delivery-format option, and serialization-params (yes indent)
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params" : map { "indent": true() } })

test-case.name: fn-transform-30
test-case.description: Transforms using serialized delivery-format option, and serialization-params (yes and no indent)
test-case.test: let $out1 := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params" : map { "indent":true() } })("output"), $out2 := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params" : map { "indent":false() } })("output") return $out1 eq $out2

test-case.name: fn-transform-31
test-case.description: Transform using option serialization-params, to output result as html (with delivery-format serialized)

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup

test-case.test:
let $in := xs:string(" XSLT Programmer?s Reference Michael H. Kay XSLT Doug Tidwell Simon St. Laurent Robert Romano "), $style := xs:string('
:
') return transform(map{"source-node":fn:parse-xml($in), "stylesheet-text":$style, "delivery-format":"serialized", "serialization-params": map{"method": "html" }} )("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-32
test-case.description: Transform using option serialization-params, to output result as xml (with delivery-format serialized)

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup
Now runs in XPath as suggested by bug 29997

test-case.test:
let $in := xs:string(" XSLT Programmer?s Reference Michael H. Kay XSLT Doug Tidwell Simon St. Laurent Robert Romano ") return let $style := xs:string('
:
') return transform(map{"source-node":fn:parse-xml($in), "stylesheet-text":$style, "delivery-format":"serialized", "serialization-params": map{"method": "xml"} } )("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-33
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <xsl:for-each select='//section'> <xsl:result-document href='section{position()}.html'> <!-- instructions content here --> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" , $xml := "<doc> <section>sect1</section> <section>sect2</section> <section>sect3</section> </doc>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xml), "base-output-uri" : resolve-uri("transform/sandbox/fn-transform-33.xml", static-base-uri()), "delivery-format":"serialized"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-34
test-case.description: Transform using option base-output-uri, and document delivery-format

modified.change: Change assertion: result is a doc so no parse needed

test-case.name: fn-transform-35
test-case.description: Transform using option base-output-uri, and serialized delivery-format

test-case.name: fn-transform-36
test-case.description: Transform using serialized delivery-format option, and serialization-params (yes indent)

modified.change: Assertions added to check use of serialization-param

test-case.name: fn-transform-36a
test-case.description: Transform using serialized delivery-format option, and serialization-params (no indent)

test-case.name: fn-transform-37
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format and base-output-uri options
test-case.test:
let $xsl :="

Section

Some text here.

 " , $xml := "
sect1
sect2
sect3
" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xml), "base-output-uri" : resolve-uri("transform/sandbox/fn-transform-37/output.html", static-base-uri()), "delivery-format":"serialized"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-38
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format and base-output-uri options

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup

all-of.assert: some $key in $result satisfies doc($key)//h1 = 'Header for section 2'

test-case.name: fn-transform-39
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format option, but no base-output-uri (xsl:result-document/@href is absolute)

modified.change: Added XP31+ dependency, use function-style map lookup

test-case.test: let $res := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs2, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"serialized"}) return map:keys($res)

all-of.assert: some $key in $result satisfies doc($key)//h1 = 'Header for section 2'

test-case.name: fn-transform-40
test-case.description: Transform producing one result document (as secondary result doc), using serialized delivery-format and base-output-uri options

test-case.name: fn-transform-41
test-case.description: Transform using options stylesheet-node and stylesheet-base-uri
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node" : $staticbaseuri, "initial-template" : QName('','main'), "stylesheet-base-uri": "http://www.example.com"})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-42
test-case.description: Transform using static base URI default from option stylesheet-node
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node" : $staticbaseuri, "initial-template" : QName('','main')})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-43
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format and base-output-uri options

all-of.assert: some $key in map:keys($result) satisfies parse-xml($result?($key))//h1 = 'Header for section 2'

test-case.name: fn-transform-44
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format and base-output-uri options
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <xsl:for-each select='//section'> <xsl:result-document href='section{position()}.xml'> <!-- instructions content here --> <out> <xsl:value-of select='position()'/> </out> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" , $xml := "<doc> <section>sect1</section> <section>sect2</section> <section>sect3</section> </doc>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xml), "base-output-uri" : resolve-uri("transform/sandbox/fn-transform-44/output.xml", static-base-uri()), "delivery-format":"serialized"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-45
test-case.description: Transform using option base-output-uri, and serialized delivery-format

test-case.name: fn-transform-46
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using serialized delivery-format option, but no base-output-uri (xsl:result-document/@href is absolute)
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs2, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"serialized"})

all-of.assert: some $key in map:keys($result) satisfies parse-xml($result($key))//h1 = 'Header for section 2'

test-case.name: fn-transform-47
test-case.description: Transform producing multiple result documents, using document delivery-format option, but no base-output-uri (xsl:result-document/@href is absolute)
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs2, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"document"})

all-of.assert: some $key in map:keys($result) satisfies $result($key)//h1 = 'Header for section 2'

test-case.name: fn-transform-48
test-case.description: Transform with additional unrecognised option which is ignored
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "another-option" : "dummy"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-50
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option static-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:param name='static-param' static='yes' select='"success"'/> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='$static-param'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-node":parse-xml($xsl), "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "static-params":map{QName('','static-param'):"Hello World"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-51
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option static-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:param name='static-param' static='yes' select='"success"'/> <xsl:param name='alt-param' static='yes' select='upper-case($static-param)'/> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='$static-param'/><xsl:value-of select='$alt-param'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-node":parse-xml($xsl), "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "static-params":map{QName('','static-param'):"Hello"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-52
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option static-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:param name='static-param' static='yes' select='"success"'/> <xsl:param name='alt-param' static='yes' select='upper-case($static-param)'/> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='$static-param'/><xsl:value-of select='$alt-param'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-node":parse-xml($xsl), "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "static-params":map{QName('','static-param'):"Hello", QName('','alt-param'):"World"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-53
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option template-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='template-param' select='"old"'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$template-param' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "template-params": map{QName('','template-param'):"new"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-54
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option template-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='param1' select='"old1"'/> <xsl:param name='param2' select='"old2"'/> <xsl:param name='param3' select='"old3"'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$param1' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param2' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param3' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "template-params": map{QName('','param1'):"new1", QName('','param2'):"new2", QName('','param4'):"new4"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-55
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option template-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='param1' select='"old1"'/> <xsl:param name='param2' required='yes'/> <xsl:param name='param3' select='"old3"'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$param1' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param2' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param3' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "template-params": map{QName('','param1'):"new1", QName('','param2'):"new2"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-56
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option template-params (note $param1 is tunnel param so not set)
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='param1' select='"old1"' tunnel='yes'/> <xsl:param name='param2' select='"old2"'/> <xsl:param name='param3' select='"old3"'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$param1' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param2' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param3' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "template-params": map{QName('','param1'):"new1", QName('','param2'):"new2", QName('','param4'):"new4"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-57
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option tunnel-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='param1' select='"old1"' tunnel='yes'/> <xsl:param name='param2' select='"old2"'/> <xsl:param name='param3' select='"old3"'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$param1' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param2' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param3' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "tunnel-params": map{QName('','param1'):"tunnel1", QName('','param2'):"tunnel2"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-58
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 options template-params and tunnel-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='param1' select='"old1"' tunnel='yes'/> <xsl:param name='param2' select='"old2"'/> <xsl:param name='param3' select='"old3"'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$param1' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param2' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param3' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "template-params": map{QName('','param1'):"new1", QName('','param2'):"new2", QName('','param4'):"new4"}, "tunnel-params": map{QName('','param1'):"tunnel1", QName('','param2'):"tunnel2"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-60
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 options initial-function and function-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:my='http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions' version='3.0'> <xsl:function name='my:user-function' visibility='public'> <xsl:param name='param1'/> <xsl:param name='param2'/> <this> <xsl:value-of select='$param1'/><xsl:value-of select='$param2'/> </this> </xsl:function> <xsl:template name='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-function": fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions','user-function'), "function-params": ["new1","new2"] })

test-case.name: fn-transform-61
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 options initial-function and function-params for version 2.0 stylesheet (needs an XSLT 3.0 processor)
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:my='http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions' version='2.0'> <xsl:function name='my:user-function' visibility='public'> <xsl:param name='param1'/> <xsl:param name='param2'/> <this> <xsl:value-of select='$param1'/><xsl:value-of select='$param2'/> </this> </xsl:function> <xsl:template name='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{ "stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-function": fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions','user-function'), "function-params": ["new1","new2"], "xslt-version": 3.0 })

test-case.name: fn-transform-62
test-case.description: Transform with XSLT 3.0 delivery-format raw
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/' as='xs:integer'> <xsl:sequence select='count(//*)'/> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<one><two/><three/><four/></one>"), "delivery-format":"raw"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-63
test-case.description: Transform using option initial-template with XSLT 3.0 delivery-format raw
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='main' as='xs:integer'> <xsl:sequence select='count(//*)'/> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<one><two/><three/><four/></one>"), "initial-template": QName('','main'), "delivery-format":"raw"})

test-case.name: fn-transform-64
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 options initial-function, function-params, and delivery-format raw

modified.change: Now runs in XPath as suggested by bug 29997

test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:my='http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions' version='3.0'> <xsl:function name='my:user-function' as='xs:integer*' visibility='public'> <xsl:param name='param1'/> <xsl:param name='param2'/> <xsl:sequence select='$param1 to $param2'/> </xsl:function> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text": $xsl, "initial-function": fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions','user-function'), "function-params": [1,5], "delivery-format": "raw" })

test-case.name: fn-transform-65
test-case.description: Transform using serialization-param cdata-section-elements
test-case.test: let $xsl :=" green blue red pink black " return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params": map{'cdata-section-elements': (QName('http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions','c'), QName('', 'c'))} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-66
test-case.description: Transform using serialization-param suppress-indentation
test-case.test: let $xsl :=" green blue red pink black " return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params": map{'suppress-indentation': (QName('http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions','c'), QName('', 'c'))} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-67
test-case.description: Transform using merged character maps
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:my='http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions' version='2.0'> <xsl:output use-character-maps='map-one'/> <xsl:character-map name='map-one'> <xsl:output-character character='-' string='(hyphen)'/> <xsl:output-character character='*' string='(asterisk)'/> </xsl:character-map> <xsl:template name='main'> <out>a-b*c</out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params": map{'use-character-maps': map{'*':'(star)'}} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-68
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a specific product
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:saxon='http://saxon.sf.net/' xmlns:my='http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <out><xsl:value-of select=""saxon:in-summer-time(xs:dateTime('2016-07-01T00:00:00'), 'Europe/London')""/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','vendor'):'Saxonica'} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-69
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a specific product
test-case.test: let $xsl := " 42 " return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','product-name'):'Xalan'} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-70
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a schema-aware transformer
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:chrono='http://chronology.com/' version='2.0'> <xsl:import-schema> <xs:schema targetNamespace='http://chronology.com/'> <xs:simpleType name='c4'> <xs:restriction base='xs:string'> <xs:pattern value='....'/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </xsl:import-schema> <xsl:template name='main'> <out><xsl:value-of select=""chrono:c4('abcd')""/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','is-schema-aware'):true()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-71
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a non-schema-aware transformer
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:xs='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema' xmlns:chrono='http://chronology.com/' version='2.0'> <xsl:import-schema> <xs:schema targetNamespace='http://chronology.com/'> <xs:simpleType name='c4'> <xs:restriction base='xs:string'> <xs:pattern value='....'/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </xsl:import-schema> <xsl:template name='main'> <out><xsl:value-of select=""chrono:c4('abcd')""/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','is-schema-aware'):false()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-72
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that supports backwards compatibility mode
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <out><xsl:value-of select=""substring(current-date(), 1, 2) = '20'"" version='1.0'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','supports-backwards-compatibility'):true()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-73
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that does not support backwards compatibility mode
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <out><xsl:value-of select=""substring(current-date(), 1, 2) = '20'"" version='1.0'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','supports-backwards-compatibility'):false()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-74
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that supports the namespace axis
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='*/namespace::xsl'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xsl), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','supports-namespace-axis'):true()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-75
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that does not support the namespace axis
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='*/namespace::xsl'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node": parse-xml($xsl), "delivery-format" : "serialized", "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','supports-namespace-axis'):false()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-76
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that supports streaming
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:mode streamable='yes'/> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='x/y/z'/></out> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name='main'> <out>ok</out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "delivery-format" : "serialized", "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','supports-streaming'):true()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-77
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that supports streaming, but the stylesheet is not streamable
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:mode streamable='yes'/> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='x/y + x/z'/></out> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name='main'> <out>ok</out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "delivery-format" : "serialized", "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','supports-streaming'):true()} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-78
test-case.description: Transform with a request for a transformer that supports XPath 3.1
test-case.test: let $xsl := "<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <out><xsl:value-of select='array{1,2,3}(2)'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "delivery-format" : "serialized", "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "requested-properties" : map{fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform','xpath-version'):"3.1"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-79
test-case.description: Transform with a post-processing request, delivery-format document
test-case.test: let $xsl := " " return let $expected := parse-xml('89')/* return let $trans-result := transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "delivery-format" : "document", "source-node": parse-xml('89'), "post-process" : function($uri, $doc) { $doc/out/a/b } }) return deep-equal(trace($trans-result("output"), 'actual'), $expected)

test-case.name: fn-transform-80
test-case.description: Transform with a post-processing request, delivery-format serialized
test-case.test: let $xsl := " " return let $expected := parse-xml('89')/* return let $trans-result := transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "delivery-format" : "serialized", "serialization-params" : map { "method":"xml", "omit-xml-declaration":true(), "indent":false() }, "source-node": parse-xml('89'), "post-process" : function($uri, $out) { concat(substring($out, 1, 12), '...') } }) return deep-equal(trace($trans-result("output"), 'actual'), "8...")

test-case.name: fn-transform-81
test-case.description: Transform with a post-processing request, delivery-format serialized
test-case.test: let $xsl := " " return let $expected := parse-xml('89')/* return let $trans-result := transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "delivery-format" : "raw", "serialization-params" : map { "method":"xml", "omit-xml-declaration":true(), "indent":false() }, "source-node": parse-xml('89'), "post-process" : function($uri, $out) { $out + 3 } }) return deep-equal(trace($trans-result("output"), 'actual'), 45)

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-1
test-case.description: Loads a stylesheet from the location render.xsl, but fails to supply a source document

modified.change: Rename stylesheet-uri as stylesheet-location; change expected error

test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render})return $result("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-2
test-case.description: Error test case to detect supplied parameters that are mutually exclusive (stylesheet-text and stylesheet-location)
test-case.test:
let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0' xmlns:app='http://www.example.com'> <xsl:template name='app:main' > <xsl:for-each select='section'> <xsl:result-document href='section{position()}.html'> <!-- instructions content here --> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" , $xml := "<doc> <section>sect1</section> <section>sect2</section> </doc>" return
let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl,"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node":fn:parse-xml($xml)})return $result?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-3
test-case.description: Error test case to detect supplied parameters that are mutually exclusive (stylesheet-text and stylesheet-node)
test-case.test:
let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0' xmlns:app='http://www.example.com'> <xsl:template name='app:main' > <xsl:for-each select='section'> <xsl:result-document href='section{position()}.html'> <!-- instructions content here --> </xsl:result-document> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return
let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text": $xsl,"stylesheet-node" : fn:doc($render), "source-node" : fn:doc($uri)})return $result?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-4
test-case.description: Error - the type of the value supplied for the option 'xslt-version' is incorrect
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "xslt-version":"2.0" })

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-5
test-case.description: Error - the type of the value supplied for the option 'stylesheet-params' is incorrect
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template match='/'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "stylesheet-params":"v" })

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-6
test-case.description: Error test case to detect supplied parameters that are mutually exclusive (initial-mode and initial-template)
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='2.0'> <xsl:template name='start'> <x><xsl:value-of select='.' /></x> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match='/' mode='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-mode": fn:QName('','main'), "initial-template": fn:QName('','start') })

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-7
test-case.description: Error - transform must have some options (at least one stylesheet and one source option)
test-case.test: transform(map{})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-8
test-case.description: Error - value supplied for option base-output-uri should be absolute

modified.change: If the value [of base-output-uri] is a relative reference, it is resolved against the static base URI of the fn:transform function call

test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node" : $sbu, "source-node" : $sections, "initial-template" : QName("", "main"), "base-output-uri" : "fn/transform/output.xml", "delivery-format" : "serialized"}) ?*

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-9
test-case.description: Error - transform using xsl:include with relative href, using option stylesheet-text, but without stylesheet-base-uri
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet version='2.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'> <xsl:include href='transform/staticbaseuri.xsl'/> </xsl:stylesheet>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text" : $xsl, "initial-template" : QName('','main')})?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-9a
test-case.description: Error - value supplied for stylesheet-base-uri should be absolute
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet version='2.0' xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform'> <xsl:include href='staticbaseuri.xsl'/> </xsl:stylesheet>" return fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-text" : $xsl, "initial-template" : QName('','main'), "stylesheet-base-uri": "transform/include.xsl" })?output

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-10
test-case.description: Error - location of output documents (delivery-format serialized) undefined; no base-output-uri and xsl:result-document/@href is relative

modified.change: When no base-output-uri is supplied, the implementation may supply a default

test-case.test: let $res := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"serialized"}) return map:keys($res)!tokenize(., '/')[last()]

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-11
test-case.description: Error - location of output documents (delivery-format serialized) undefined; no base-output-uri and xsl:result-document/@href is relative

modified.change: When no base-output-uri is supplied, the implementation may supply a default

test-case.test: let $res := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"serialized"}) return map:keys($res)!tokenize(., '/')[last()]

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-12
test-case.description: Error - location of output documents (delivery-format document) undefined; no base-output-uri and xsl:result-document/@href is relative

modified.change: When no base-output-uri is supplied, the implementation may supply a default

test-case.test: let $res := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"document"}) return map:keys($res)!tokenize(., '/')[last()]

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-13
test-case.description: Error - value supplied for the option 'delivery-format' is not one of those allowed
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs2, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"doc"})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-14
test-case.description: Error - value 'raw' supplied for the option 'delivery-format' is not allowed if processor is not XSLT 3.0
test-case.test: fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-node":$multipledocs2, "source-node":$sections, "delivery-format":"raw"})("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-15
test-case.description: Error - the initial template defines a required parameter which is not included in the map supplied in the XSLT 3.0 transform option template-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:template name='main'> <xsl:param name='param1' select='"old1"'/> <xsl:param name='param2' select='"old1"'/> <xsl:param name='param3' required='yes'/> <out> <xsl:value-of select='$param1' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param2' /> <xsl:value-of select='$param3' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-template": fn:QName('','main'), "template-params": map{QName('','param1'):"new1", QName('','param2'):"new2"} })

test-case.name: fn-transform-err-16
test-case.description: Error - transform using XSLT 3.0 option initial-function, but without option function-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' xmlns:my='http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions' version='3.0'> <xsl:function name='my:user-function'> <xsl:param name='param1'/> <xsl:param name='param2'/> <this> <xsl:value-of select='$param1'/><xsl:value-of select='$param2'/> </this> </xsl:function> <xsl:template name='main'> <out> <xsl:value-of select='.' /> </out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-text":$xsl, "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "initial-function": fn:QName('http://www.w3.org/fots/fn/transform/myfunctions','user-function') })

test-case.name: fn-transform-901
test-case.description: Loads a stylesheet from the location render.xsl, applies it to a document loaded from works-mod.xml, and uses an XPath expression to examine the result
test-case.test: let $result := fn:transform(map {"stylesheet-location" : $render, "source-node" : fn:doc($uri)})return $result("output")

test-case.name: fn-transform-902
test-case.description: Transform using XSLT 3.0 option static-params
test-case.test: let $xsl :="<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl='http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform' version='3.0'> <xsl:param name='static-param' static='yes' select='"success"'/> <xsl:template match='/'> <out><xsl:value-of select='$static-param'/></out> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>" return transform(map{"stylesheet-node":parse-xml($xsl), "source-node":parse-xml("<doc>this</doc>"), "static-params":map{QName('','static-param'):"Hello World"} })
